price: (Unibuke kandi) Isimayili na Idirisa (Enoki) na Dhulikifili, bose bari mu bihangana.
arabic: وَإِسۡمَٰعِيلَ وَإِدۡرِيسَ وَذَا ٱلۡكِفۡلِۖ كُلّٞ مِّنَ ٱلصَّٰبِرِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-is'māʿīla wa-id'rīsa wadhā al-kif'li kullun mina al-ṣābirīna
